title: HOUR 3 – Steph Curry’s Legacy Is On The Line
itunes:title: HOUR 3 – Steph Curry’s Legacy Is On The Line
description:
Steph Curry is great, selfless & great players like him aren’t defined by a trophy case

Colin hands out grades for the NBA Conference Finals

Guest: 3x NBA All-Star/NBA Champion Antoine Walker

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
